name: Reference - Public Key Pinning Extension for HTTP
x_kb_abstract: RFC 7469 describes an HTTP extension that allows web host operators to instruct user agents to remember ('pin') the hosts' cryptographic identities over a period of time. This decreases the risk of MITM attacks due to compromised Certificate Authorities.
x_kb_author: C. Evans, C. Palmer, R. Sleevi
x_kb_reference_title: Public Key Pinning Extension for HTTP
